attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: The Music AI Sandbox has introduced new features that enable music professionals to harness the capabilities of generative AI, promoting innovative collaboration.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: AI is increasingly viewed as a collaborator in creative processes, suggesting that its ability to assist humans can enhance rather than replace traditional creativity.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Advancements in AI processing technology are making artificial intelligence more accessible and integrated into daily applications, driven by better models and increased data availability.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: In South Korea, generative AI is transforming the webcomics industry, though some traditional artists, like cartoonist Lee Hyun-se, express a desire to maintain control over their creative work.
